title: Brendan Murphy from Counterparts
itunes:title: Brendan Murphy from Counterparts
description:
I have the pleasure today of bringing you a great chat I had with Brendan Murphy, the vocalist from Canadian hardcore band Counterparts. We chatted about the impressions people get of being in a band, legacy and suburban living. It's an engaging chat and I am very happy to present this to you all! This episode is brought to you exclusively by Revelation Records and their three new releases from Title Fight, Down To Nothing and The Rival Mob. Pick up all three at Revhq.com! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
